column1: The process of arguing is also the process of justifying and explaining. Here
column2: we focus on argumentative explanations in Abstract Bipolar Argumentation. We propose new defence and acceptability semantics
column3: which operates on both attack and support relations
column4: and use them to formalize two types of explanations
column5: concise and strong explanations. We also show how to compute the explanations with Bipolar Dispute Trees.
